abstract.text: Allow eligible customers to subscribe to Apple Music.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

metadata.title: Offering Apple Music Subscription in Your App

inlineContent.text: With an Apple Music membership, customers can play songs from the entire Apple Music catalog or access their iCloud music library across all their devices. You can offer users the option to sign up for an Apple Music subscription directly from your app by following these steps:
Request Apple Music Library access from the customer.
Determine if the customer is eligible for an Apple Music subscription.
Present the sign-up subscription offer if the customer is eligible.
The user must grant permission before your app can access Apple Music library. See
for details. Use
to determine your app’s authorization status. If the authorization status is
, your app can check if the user is eligible for an Apple Music subscription offer.
When the Music app is absent on the user’s device,
fails to load.

content.text: Determine if the User is Eligible for an Apple Music Subscription

for details. A user has an active subscription to Apple Music when
contains
. A user is eligible for the offer when
doesn’t include
but contains

content.text: Present the Offer to Subscribe for Apple Music

abstract.text: Support In-App Purchases and interactions with the App Store.
The user authorizes playback of Apple Music tracks and the addition of tracks to their music library.
The device allows playback of Apple Music catalog tracks.
The device allows subscription to the Apple Music catalog.
An object that determines the current capabilities of a person’s Music library.
Returns the type of authorization the customer has for accessing the Music library on the device.
Gets the current capabilities associated with the Music library on the device.
A subscribe action in a cloud service setup view, such as an offer to subscribe to Apple Music.
Message identifier for adding music.
Message identifier for connecting.
Message identifier for joining.
Message identifier for playing music.
Keys to specify the types of setup options for a cloud service.
A key that specifies the action for a setup entry point.
A key that specifies the iTunes Store affiliate token.
A key that is used to select the main message presented to the user for this setup view.
A view controller that helps people perform setup for a cloud service, like an Apple Music subscription.
Loads the cloud service setup view with the specified options.
Determine which Apple Music capabilities are available on a customer’s device.

abstract.text: Prompt the customer to authorize access to Apple Music library.
